spite.name: Spite

detect.name: Detect

watersport.desc: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns. (+1 Priority)

calmmind.name: Calm Mind
calmmind.desc: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

leafblade.name: Leaf Blade
leafblade.desc: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily. (+1 Crit)

dragondance.name: Dragon Dance
dragondance.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

rockblast.name: Rock Blast
rockblast.desc: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row. (Bullet, Pulse)

shockwave.name: Shock Wave
shockwave.desc: The user zaps the targets with quick jolts of electricity. This attack never misses. May lower evasion. (20%)

waterpulse.name: Water Pulse
waterpulse.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target. (20%, Pulse)

premonition.name: Premonition
premonition.desc: Two turns after this move is used, a ghostly power blasts the target.

psychoboost.name: Psycho Boost
psychoboost.desc: The user blasts the target at full power. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

roost.name: Roost
roost.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
roost.desc: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user’s HP by up to half of its max HP. The user loses the Flying-type until the end of the turn.

gravity.name: Gravity
gravity.desc: Enables Flying-type Pokémon or Pokémon with the Levitate Ability to be hit by Ground-type moves. Moves that require being airborne can't be used. Lowers Evasion for all.

miracleeye.name: Miracle Eye
miracleeye.desc: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

wakeupslap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wakeupslap.desc: This attack inflicts double damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however. (Punch)

hammerarm.name: Hammer Arm
hammerarm.desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however. (Punch)

gyroball.name: Gyro Ball
gyroball.desc: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move’s power. (150BP - 1BP, Bullet)

healingwish.name: Healing Wish
healingwish.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

brine.name: Brine
brine.desc: If the target’s HP is half or less, this attack will hit with double the power.

naturalgift.name: Natural Gift
naturalgift.desc: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move’s type and power.

feint.name: Feint
feint.desc: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves. (+2 Priority, Punch)

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.desc: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect. (Jaw)

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.desc: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.desc: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies’ stats.

metalburst.name: Metal Burst
metalburst.desc: The user retaliates with 50% greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

uturn.name: U-turn
uturn.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

closecombat.name: Close Combat
closecombat.desc: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

payback.name: Payback
payback.desc: The user stores power, then punches. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled. (Punch)

assertion.name: Assertion
assertion.desc: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack’s power is doubled. (Punch)

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.desc: This move prevents the targets from using their held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

fling.name: Fling
fling.desc: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move’s power and effects depend on the item. Thrown berries will be eaten. (Pulse)

psychoshift.name: Psycho Shift
psychoshift.desc: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target. Works on Brn, Prz, Psn, and Slp.

trumpcard.name: Trump Card
trumpcard.desc: The fewer PP this move has, the greater its power. (3 = 60BP, 2 = 80BP, 1 = 200BP)

healblock.name: Heal Block
healblock.desc: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

wringout.name: Wring Out
wringout.desc: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater the move’s power. (120BP - 1BP)

powertrick.name: Power Trick
powertrick.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.desc: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

luckychant.name: Lucky Chant
luckychant.desc: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits for five turns. (+1 Priority)

mefirst.name: Me First
mefirst.desc: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with 50% greater power. The move fails if not first. Z-Eff: +2 Spe

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.desc: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

powerswap.name: Power Swap
powerswap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

guardswap.name: Guard Swap
guardswap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.desc: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move’s power. (60BP + 20BP for each positive stat change the target has.)

lastresort.name: Last Resort
lastresort.desc: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

worryseed.name: Worry Seed
worryseed.desc: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target’s Ability Insomnia.

suckerpunch.name: Sucker Punch
suckerpunch.desc: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack or moves first. (+1 Priority, Punch)

toxicspikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxicspikes.desc: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing Pokémon that switch into battle. 2 Layers badly poisons.

heartswap.name: Heart Swap
heartswap.desc: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

aquaring.name: Aqua Ring
aquaring.desc: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains 1/16 HP every turn.

magnetrise.name: Magnet Rise
magnetrise.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
magnetrise.desc: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

flareblitz.name: Flare Blitz
flareblitz.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. (33% recoil) This attack may leave the target with a burn. (10%)

aurapalm.name: Aura Palm
aurapalm.desc: The target is attacked with a shock of aura. This may also leave the target with paralysis. (Punch, Pulse)

aurasphere.name: Aura Sphere
aurasphere.desc: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses. (Pulse, Bullet)

rockpolish.name: Rock Polish
rockpolish.desc: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This sharply raises the Speed stat and raises Accuracy.

poisonjab.name: Poison Jab
poisonjab.desc: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target. (30%, Punch)

darkpulse.name: Dark Pulse
darkpulse.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch. (20%, Pulse)

nightslash.name: Night Slash
nightslash.desc: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

aquatail.name: Aqua Tail
aquatail.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

seedbomb.name: Seed Bomb
seedbomb.desc: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above. (Bullet)

airslash.name: Air Slash
airslash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch. (30%)

xscissor.name: X-Scissor
xscissor.desc: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

bugbuzz.name: Bug Buzz
bugbuzz.desc: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat. (10%, Sound)

dragonpulse.name: Dragon Pulse
dragonpulse.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user’s gaping mouth. 10% chance to raise Sp.Atk (Pulse)

dracojet.name: Draco Jet
dracojet.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This attack raises the user's Speed.

powergem.name: Power Gem
powergem.desc: The user attacks with a ray of light that sparkles as if it were made of gemstones.

drainpunch.name: Drain Punch
drainpunch.desc: An energy-draining punch. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target. (Punch)

vacuumwave.name: Vacuum Wave
vacuumwave.desc: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the target. This move usually goes first. (+1 Prio, Punch, Pulse)

focusblast.name: Focus Blast
focusblast.desc: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat. (10%, Bullet, Pulse)

energyball.name: Energy Ball
energyball.desc: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat. (10%, Bullet, Pulse)

bravebird.name: Brave Bird
bravebird.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot. (33%)

earthpower.name: Earth Power
earthpower.desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat. (10%)

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.desc: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

gigaimpact.name: Giga Impact
gigaimpact.desc: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can’t move on the next turn and restores 15% of damage dealt

nastyplot.name: Nasty Plot
nastyplot.desc: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

bulletpunch.name: Bullet Punch
bulletpunch.desc: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move usually goes first. (+1 Priority, Punch, Bullet)

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.desc: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

iceshard.name: Ice Shard
iceshard.desc: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first. (+1 Priority)

shadowclaw.name: Shadow Claw
shadowclaw.desc: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

thunderfang.name: Thunder Fang
thunderfang.desc: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis. (10% Flinch, 10% Paralysis, Jaw)

icefang.name: Ice Fang
icefang.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen. (10% Flinch, 10% Freeze, Jaw)

firefang.name: Fire Fang
firefang.desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn. (10% Flinch, 10% Burn, Jaw)

shadowsneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadowsneak.desc: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first. (+1 Priority)

mudbomb.name: Mud Bomb
mudbomb.desc: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. This may also lower the target’s Attack. (30%, Bullet, Pulse)

psychocut.name: Psycho Cut
psychocut.desc: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily. (+1 Crit)

zenheadbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zenheadbutt.desc: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch. (20%)

mirrorshot.name: Mirror Shot
mirrorshot.desc: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s Sp.Atk. (30%, Pulse)

flashcannon.name: Flash Cannon
flashcannon.desc: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat. (10%, Pulse)

rockclimb.name: Rock Climb
rockclimb.desc: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target. (20%)

defog.name: Defog
defog.desc: A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target’s Evasiveness.

trickroom.name: Trick Room
trickroom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

dracometeor.name: Draco Meteor
dracometeor.desc: Comets are summoned down from the sky onto the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: The user strikes everything around it by letting loose a flare of electricity. This may also cause paralysis. (30%)

lavaplume.name: Lava Plume
lavaplume.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn. (30%)

leafstorm.name: Leaf Storm
leafstorm.desc: The user whips up a storm of leaves around the target. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

powerwhip.name: Power Whip
powerwhip.desc: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

rockwrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rockwrecker.desc: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can’t move on the next turn and restores 15% of damage dealt. (Bullet, Pulse)

crosspoison.name: Cross Poison
crosspoison.desc: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. (10%) Critical hits land more easily. (+1 Crit)

gunkshot.name: Gunk Shot
gunkshot.desc: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target. (30%, Pulse)

ironhead.name: Iron Head
ironhead.desc: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch. (30%)

magnetbomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnetbomb.desc: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses. (Bullet, Pulse)

stoneedge.name: Stone Edge
stoneedge.desc: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.desc: If the opposing Pokémon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

stealthrock.name: Stealth Rock
stealthrock.desc: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap damages enemy Pokémon that enter the field based on their matchup to Rock-Types.

grassknot.name: Grass Knot
grassknot.desc: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the move’s power. (20 - 120 Power)

chatter.name: Chatter
chatter.desc: The user attacks everyone with sound waves of deafening chatter. This may confuse the targets. (20%, Sound)

judgment.name: Judgment
judgment.desc: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.

bugbite.name: Bug Bite
bugbite.desc: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect. (Jaw)

chargebeam.name: Charge Beam
chargebeam.desc: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user will use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat. (Pulse)

woodhammer.name: Wood Hammer
woodhammer.desc: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot. (33%)

aquajet.name: Aqua Jet
aquajet.desc: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

attackorder.name: Attack Order
attackorder.desc: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target three times. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

defendorder.name: Defend Order
defendorder.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
defendorder.desc: The user calls out its underlings to shield its allies, raising their Defense and Sp. Def stats.

healorder.name: Heal Order
healorder.desc: The user calls out its underlings to heal its team. The user and its ally regain up to a third of their max HP.

headsmash.name: Head Smash
headsmash.desc: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly. (50%)

doublehit.name: Double Hit
doublehit.desc: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a fist. The target is hit twice in a row. (Punch)

steelbeam.name: Steel Beam
steelbeam.desc: The user blasts the target with concentrated metal. The user can’t move on the next turn and recovers 15% of the damage dealt. (Pulse)

spacialrend.name: Spacial Rend
spacialrend.desc: The user tears the target along with the space around it. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

lunardance.name: Lunar Dance
lunardance.desc: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

crushgrip.name: Crush Grip
crushgrip.desc: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move’s power. (1-120 Power)

magmastorm.name: Magma Storm
magmastorm.desc: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of magma that rages for four to five turns.

darkvoid.name: Dark Void
darkvoid.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
darkvoid.desc: Opposing Pokémon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

seedflare.name: Seed Flare
seedflare.desc: The user emits a shock wave from its body to attack its target. This may also harshly lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.

ominouswind.name: Ominous Wind
ominouswind.desc: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once. (10%)

shadowforce.name: Shadow Force
shadowforce.desc: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

honeclaws.name: Hone Claws
honeclaws.desc: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and Accuracy.

wideguard.name: Wide Guard
wideguard.desc: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn. (+3 Priority)

guardsplit.name: Guard Split
guardsplit.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

powersplit.name: Power Split
powersplit.desc: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

wonderroom.name: Wonder Room
wonderroom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns. (+1 Priority)

psyshock.name: Psyshock
psyshock.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

venoshock.name: Venoshock
venoshock.desc: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.desc: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

ragepowder.name: Rage Powder
ragepowder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user. (+2 Priority)

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.desc: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

magicroom.name: Magic Room
magicroom.desc: The user creates a bizarre area in which Pokémon’s held items lose their effects for five turns. (+1 Priority)

smackdown.name: Smack Down
smackdown.desc: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when it’s hit. (Bullet)

stormthrow.name: Storm Throw
stormthrow.desc: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

flameburst.name: Flame Burst
flameburst.desc: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame 2-5 times. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well by 1/16 HP per hit. (Pulse)

oilspill.name: Oil Spill
oilspill.desc: The user strikes everything around it by swamping the area with a giant sludge wave. This may also poison those hit. (10%)

quiverdance.name: Quiver Dance
quiverdance.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
quiverdance.desc: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user’s Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

heavyslam.name: Heavy Slam
heavyslam.desc: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power. (40 - 120 Power)

synchronoise.name: Synchronoise
synchronoise.desc: Using an odd sound wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it. (Sound)

electroball.name: Electro Ball
electroball.desc: The user hurls an electric orb at the target. The faster the user is than the target, the greater the move’s power. (40 - 150 Power, Bullet, Pulse)

soak.name: Soak
soak.desc: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.

flamecharge.name: Flame Charge
flamecharge.desc: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. This, move raises the user's Speed.

coil.name: Coil
coil.desc: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its Accuracy.

lowsweep.name: Low Sweep
lowsweep.desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target’s legs, which lowers the target’s Speed stat.

acidspray.name: Acid Spray
acidspray.desc: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Def stat. (Bullet, Pulse)

foulplay.name: Foul Play
foulplay.desc: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.

simplebeam.name: Simple Beam
simplebeam.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
simplebeam.desc: The user’s mysterious psychic wave changes the target’s Ability to Simple.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.desc: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s. (+1 Priority)

afteryou.name: After You
afteryou.desc: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

round.name: Round
round.desc: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can use Round too to double the power of the attacks. (Sound)

echoedvoice.name: Echoed Voice
echoedvoice.desc: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, by ANY Pokémon, its power is increased. (40 - 80 - 120 - 160 - 200 Power) (Sound)

chipaway.name: Chip Away
chipaway.desc: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target’s Def and Evasion changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

clearsmog.name: Clear Smog
clearsmog.desc: The user attacks by spewing a clump of special gases. All stat changes are returned to normal. This move cannot miss.

storedpower.name: Stored Power
storedpower.desc: The user attacks the target with stored energy. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power. (+20 Power per raised stat)

quickguard.name: Quick Guard
quickguard.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
quickguard.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. (+3 Priority)

allyswitch.name: Ally Switch
allyswitch.desc: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies. (+2 Priority)

scald.name: Scald
scald.desc: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn. (30%)

shellsmash.name: Shell Smash
shellsmash.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
shellsmash.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

healpulse.name: Heal Pulse
healpulse.desc: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. (Pulse)

hex.name: Hex
hex.desc: This relentless attack does double damage to a target affected by major status conditions.

skydrop.name: Sky Drop
skydrop.desc: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky. Heavy Pokémon can't be lifted.

shiftgear.name: Shift Gear
shiftgear.desc: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

circlethrow.name: Circle Throw
circlethrow.desc: The target is thrown, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon. (-6 Priority)

incinerate.name: Incinerate
incinerate.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry or Gem, the item burns up! (Pulse)

quash.name: Quash
quash.desc: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.desc: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts double damage. (Dance)

reflecttype.name: Reflect Type
reflecttype.desc: The user reflects the target’s type, making it the same type as the target. (+1 Priority)

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.desc: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move’s power is doubled.

finalgambit.name: Final Gambit
finalgambit.desc: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.desc: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn’t holding an item. (+1 Priority)

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in flames This innaccurate but powerful move ignores the opponent's stat changes. Has a 30% Burn chance.

waterpledge.name: Water Pledge
waterpledge.desc: A column of water strikes the target. When combined with its fire equivalent, its power increases and a rainbow appears that doubles ally secondary effect chance.

firepledge.name: Fire Pledge
firepledge.desc: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears that damages non-Fire foes for 1/8 per turn.

grasspledge.name: Grass Pledge
grasspledge.desc: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears that quarters grounded enemy Speed stats.

voltswitch.name: Volt Switch
voltswitch.desc: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

strugglebug.name: Struggle Bug
strugglebug.desc: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. This lowers the Sp. Atk stat of those hit.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.desc: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

frostbreath.name: Frost Breath
frostbreath.desc: The user blows its cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

dragontail.name: Dragon Tail
dragontail.desc: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon. (-6 Priority)

workup.name: Work Up
workup.desc: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

electroweb.name: Electroweb
electroweb.desc: The user attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net. This lowers their Speed stat.

wildcharge.name: Wild Charge
wildcharge.desc: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user 33% of damage dealt. This may paralyze the target. (10%)

drillrun.name: Drill Run
drillrun.desc: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.(+1 Crit)

dualchop.name: Dual Chop
dualchop.desc: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit 2-5 times in a row. (Punch)

heartstamp.name: Heart Stamp
heartstamp.desc: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch (20%) or infatuate it for 2-4 turns. (20%)

hornleech.name: Horn Leech
hornleech.desc: The user drains the target’s energy with its horns. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

sacredsword.name: Sacred Sword
sacredsword.desc: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

razorshell.name: Razor Shell
razorshell.desc: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. (50%)

heatcrash.name: Heat Crash
heatcrash.desc: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move’s power. (40 - 120 Power)

leaftornado.name: Leaf Tornado
leaftornado.desc: The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp leaves. The target is trapped and damaged for 4-5 turns.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.desc: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch. (30%)

cottonguard.name: Cotton Guard
cottonguard.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
cottonguard.desc: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user’s Defense stat.

nightdaze.name: Night Daze
nightdaze.desc: The user lets loose a pitch-black shock wave at its target. If the target is Asleep, it will suffer terrible Nightmares, dealing 25% HP per turn.

psystrike.name: Psystrike
psystrike.desc: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

tailslap.name: Tail Slap
tailslap.desc: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

hurricane.name: Hurricane
hurricane.desc: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target. (30%)

headlongrush.name: Headlong Rush
headlongrush.desc: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user's defenses. (Punch)

geargrind.name: Gear Grind
geargrind.desc: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

searingshot.name: Searing Shot
searingshot.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn. (30%, Bullet)

technoblast.name: Techno Blast
technoblast.desc: The user fires a beam of light at its target. The move’s type changes depending on the Drive the user holds.

relicsong.name: Relic Song
relicsong.desc: The user sings an ancient song and attacks by appealing to the hearts of the listening opposing Pokémon. This may also induce sleep. (15%, Sound, Dance)

secretsword.name: Secret Sword
secretsword.desc: The user slices using a hidden technique. This power does physical damage to the target.

coldsnap.name: Cold Snap
coldsnap.desc: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air onto all nearby targets. This lowers their Speed stats.

dracobolt.name: Draco Bolt
dracobolt.desc: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis. (20%)

dracoflare.name: Draco Flare
dracoflare.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This may also leave the target with a burn. (20%)

fierydance.name: Fiery Dance
fierydance.desc: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat. (50%)

freezeshock.name: Freeze Shock
freezeshock.desc: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis. (30%)

iceburn.name: Ice Burn
iceburn.desc: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn. (30%)

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.desc: The user yells as if it’s ranting about something, which lowers the Sp. Atk stat of opposing Pokémon. (Sound)

iciclecrash.name: Icicle Crash
iciclecrash.desc: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch. (30%)

vcreate.name: V-create
vcreate.desc: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user’s Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

fusionflare.name: Fusion Flare
fusionflare.desc: The user brings down a giant flame. This move’s power is doubled when influenced by an enormous lightning bolt.

fusionbolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusionbolt.desc: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move’s power is doubled when influenced by an enormous flame.

flyingpress.name: Flying Press
flyingpress.desc: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

matblock.name: Mat Block
matblock.desc: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This only works on the first turn the user enters battle. (+1 Priority)

belch.name: Belch
belch.desc: The user lets out a damaging belch at the targets. The user must eat a held Berry to use this move. (Sound)

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
rototiller.desc: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Def, Sp. Def, and Acc. stats of grounded Grass-type Pokémon.

stickyweb.name: Sticky Web
stickyweb.desc: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

fellstinger.name: Fell Stinger
fellstinger.desc: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user’s Attack stat rises drastically.

phantomforce.name: Phantom Force
phantomforce.desc: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

trickortreat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trickortreat.desc: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target’s type.

nobleroar.name: Noble Roar
nobleroar.desc: Letting out a noble roar, the user inspires itself and raises its Sp. Atk and Speed stats. (Sound)

iondeluge.name: Ion Deluge
iondeluge.desc: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. (+1 Priority)

paraboliccharge.name: Parabolic Charge
paraboliccharge.desc: The user attacks everything around it. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.

forestscurse.name: Forest’s Curse
forestscurse.desc: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

petalblizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petalblizzard.desc: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

freezedry.name: Freeze-Dry
freezedry.desc: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. 10% This move is super effective on Water types.

disarmingvoice.name: Disarming Voice
disarmingvoice.desc: Letting out a charming cry, the user does emotional damage to opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses. (Sound)

partingshot.name: Parting Shot
partingshot.zMoveEffect: recovers all Hp of the Pokémon switching-in (Memento and Parting Shot)
partingshot.desc: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party Pokémon. (Sound)

topsyturvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsyturvy.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
topsyturvy.desc: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

drainingkiss.name: Draining Kiss
drainingkiss.desc: The user steals the target’s HP with a kiss. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

craftyshield.name: Crafty Shield
craftyshield.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
craftyshield.desc: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage. (+3 Priority)

flowershield.name: Flower Shield
flowershield.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
flowershield.desc: The user raises the Defense and Sp. Def stat of Grass Pokémon in battle with a mysterious power.

grassyterrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassyterrain.desc: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn and boosts Grass type-moves by 50%.

mistyterrain.name: Misty Terrain
mistyterrain.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.desc: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target’s move becomes Electric type. This usually moves first. (+1 Priority)

playrough.name: Play Rough
playrough.desc: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target’s Attack stat. (10%)

fairywind.name: Fairy Wind
fairywind.desc: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the target with it. This may infatuate an opponent for 2-4 turns. (30%)

moonblast.name: Moonblast
moonblast.desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target’s Sp. Atk stat. (30%)

boomburst.name: Boomburst
boomburst.desc: The user attacks everything around it with the destructive power of a terrible, explosive sound. (Sound)

fairylock.name: Fairy Lock
fairylock.desc: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all Pokémon from fleeing during the next turn. (+1 Priority)

kingsshield.name: King’s Shield
kingsshield.desc: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

playnice.name: Play Nice
playnice.desc: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target’s Sp.Atk stat and infatuates for 2-4 turns.

confide.name: Confide
confide.desc: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target’s Sp.Atk and Sp. Def stats. (Sound)

diamondstorm.name: Diamond Storm
diamondstorm.desc: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing Pokémon. This may also raise the user’s Defense stat. (30%)

steameruption.name: Steam Eruption
steameruption.desc: The user immerses the target in superheated steam. This may also leave the target with a burn. (30%)

hyperspacehole.name: Hyperspace Hole
hyperspacehole.desc: Using a hyperspace hole, the user appears right next to the target and strikes. This also hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

watershuriken.name: Water Shuriken
watershuriken.desc: The user hits the target with throwing stars two to five times in a row. This move always goes first. (+1 Priority)

mysticalfire.name: Mystical Fire
mysticalfire.desc: The user attacks by breathing a special, hot fire. This also lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

spikyshield.name: Spiky Shield
spikyshield.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact by 1/8 of their Max HP.

aromaticmist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromaticmist.desc: The user raises the Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon by using a mysterious aroma.

eerieimpulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerieimpulse.desc: The user’s body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target’s Sp. Atk stat.

venomdrench.name: Venom Drench
venomdrench.desc: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

powder.name: Powder
powder.desc: The user covers all targets in a combustible powder for 3 turns. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target. (+1 Prio)

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.desc: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats sharply on the next turn.

magneticflux.name: Magnetic Flux
magneticflux.desc: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

happyhour.name: Happy Hour
happyhour.desc: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle. Use it as a Z-Move to raise all stats!

electricterrain.name: Electric Terrain
electricterrain.desc: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves by 50%. Pokémon on the ground can no longer fall asleep.

dazzlinggleam.name: Dazzling Gleam
dazzlinggleam.desc: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash. This has a chance to drop the target's Evasion stat. (25%)

celebrate.name: Celebrate
celebrate.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day! Use it as a Z-Move to raise all stats!

holdhands.name: Hold Hands
holdhands.desc: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy. Use it as a Z-Move to raise all stats!

babydolleyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
babydolleyes.desc: The user looks at the target with cute, tearfilled eyes, which lowers their Attack stat. This move usually goes first. (+1 Priority)

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.desc: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

holdback.name: Hold Back
holdback.desc: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

infestation.name: Infestation
infestation.desc: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can’t flee during this time. The infestation deals 1/8HP per turn.

poweruppunch.name: Power-Up Punch
poweruppunch.desc: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat. (Punch)

oblivionwing.name: Oblivion Wing
oblivionwing.desc: The user absorbs its target’s HP. The user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage taken by the target.

thousandarrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousandarrows.desc: This move also hits opposing Pokémon that are in the air. Those Pokémon are knocked down to the ground.

thousandwaves.name: Thousand Waves
thousandwaves.desc: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can’t flee from battle.

landswrath.name: Land’s Wrath
landswrath.desc: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on an opposing Pokémon to damage them.

lightofruin.name: Light of Ruin
lightofruin.desc: Drawing power from the Eternal Flower, the user fires a powerful beam of light. This also damages the user quite a lot.

originpulse.name: Origin Pulse
originpulse.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with countless beams of light that glow a deep and brilliant blue. (Pulse)

precipiceblades.name: Precipice Blades
precipiceblades.desc: The user attacks opposing Pokémon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

dragonascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragonascent.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

hyperspacefury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspacefury.desc: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user’s Defense stat falls.

breakneckblitz.name: Breakneck Blitz
breakneckblitz.desc: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

breakneckblitzr.name: Breakneck Blitz-R
breakneckblitzr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

alloutpummeling.name: All-Out Pummeling
alloutpummeling.desc: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

alloutpummelingr.name: All-Out Pummeling-R
alloutpummelingr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

supersonicskystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
supersonicskystrike.desc: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

supersonicskystriker.name: Supersonic Skystrike-R
supersonicskystriker.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

aciddownpour.name: Acid Downpour
aciddownpour.desc: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

aciddownpourr.name: Acid Downpour-R
aciddownpourr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

tectonicrage.name: Tectonic Rage
tectonicrage.desc: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

tectonicrager.name: Tectonic Rage-R
tectonicrager.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

continentalcrush.name: Continental Crush
continentalcrush.desc: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

continentalcrushr.name: Continental Crush-R
continentalcrushr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

savagespinout.name: Savage Spin-Out
savagespinout.desc: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

savagespinoutr.name: Savage Spin-Out-R
savagespinoutr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

neverendingnightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
neverendingnightmare.desc: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user’s Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

neverendingnightmarer.name: Never-Ending Nightmare-R
neverendingnightmarer.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

corkscrewcrash.name: Corkscrew Crash
corkscrewcrash.desc: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

corkscrewcrashr.name: Corkscrew Crash-R
corkscrewcrashr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

infernooverdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive
infernooverdrive.desc: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

infernooverdriver.name: Inferno Overdrive-R
infernooverdriver.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

hydrovortex.name: Hydro Vortex
hydrovortex.desc: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

hydrovortexr.name: Hydro Vortex-R
hydrovortexr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

bloomdoom.name: Bloom Doom
bloomdoom.desc: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

bloomdoomr.name: Bloom Doom-R
bloomdoomr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

gigavolthavoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc
gigavolthavoc.desc: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

gigavolthavocr.name: Gigavolt Havoc-R
gigavolthavocr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

shatteredpsyche.name: Shattered Psyche
shatteredpsyche.desc: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

shatteredpsycher.name: Shattered Psyche-R
shatteredpsycher.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

subzeroslammer.name: Subzero Slammer
subzeroslammer.desc: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

subzeroslammerr.name: Subzero Slammer-R
subzeroslammerr.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

devastatingdrake.name: Devastating Drake
devastatingdrake.desc: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

devastatingdraker.name: Devastating Drake-R
devastatingdraker.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

blackholeeclipse.name: Black Hole Eclipse
blackholeeclipse.desc: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

blackholeeclipser.name: Black Hole Eclipse-R
blackholeeclipser.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

twinkletackle.name: Twinkle Tackle
twinkletackle.desc: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

twinkletackler.name: Twinkle Tackle-R
twinkletackler.desc: Using its special resonance with this particular Z-Crystal, the user is able to utilize this special Z-Move, despite being a different type than the crystal!

catastropika.name: Catastropika
catastropika.desc: Pikachu surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity and pounces on its target. Always Critical hits. Raises Atk and Spe.2 stages after use.

shoreup.name: Shore Up
shoreup.zMoveEffect: resets lowered stats of the user
shoreup.desc: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores 75% HP in a sandstorm.

firstimpression.name: First Impression
firstimpression.desc: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

banefulbunker.name: Baneful Bunker
banefulbunker.desc: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

spiritshackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spiritshackle.desc: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target’s shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

darkestlariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkestlariat.desc: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target’s stat changes don’t affect this attack’s damage.

sparklingaria.name: Sparkling Aria
sparklingaria.desc: The user bursts into song, emitting many bubbles. Any Pokémon suffering from a burn will be healed by the touch of these bubbles. (Sound)

icehammer.name: Ice Hammer
icehammer.desc: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user’s Speed, however. (Punch)

floralhealing.name: Floral Healing
floralhealing.desc: The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores 75% HP when the terrain is grass.

highhorsepower.name: High Horsepower
highhorsepower.desc: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

strengthsap.name: Strength Sap
strengthsap.desc: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target’s Attack stat. It also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

solarblade.name: Solar Blade
solarblade.desc: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light’s energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

trailblaze.name: Trailblaze
trailblaze.desc: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.desc: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn. (+3 Prio)

toxicthread.name: Toxic Thread
toxicthread.desc: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target’s Speed stat.

laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
laserfocus.desc: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

gearup.name: Gear Up
gearup.desc: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats sharply of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability, but lowers their Speed.

throatchop.name: Throat Chop
throatchop.desc: The user attacks the target’s throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for 2-4 turns. (Punch)

pollenpuff.name: Pollen Puff
pollenpuff.desc: The user attacks the enemy with an irritating puff that explodes. If the target is an ally, it gives the ally a soothing puff that restores 50% HP instead. (Bullet)

anchorshot.name: Anchor Shot
anchorshot.desc: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

psychicterrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychicterrain.desc: This protects Pokémon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves by 50% for five turns.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.desc: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

firelash.name: Fire Lash
firelash.desc: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target’s Defense stat.

powertrip.name: Power Trip
powertrip.desc: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the move’s power. (20BP + 20 per raised stat)

burnup.name: Burn Up
burnup.desc: To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out. After using this move, the user will no longer be Fire type.

speedswap.name: Speed Swap
speedswap.desc: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

steeltrap.name: Steel Trap
steeltrap.desc: The user bites the target with teeth as hard as tempered steel. This has a 30% chance to trap and damage the target for 2 turns. (Jaw)

purify.name: Purify
purify.desc: The user heals the target’s status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user’s HP by 75%. (+1 Prio)

revelationdance.name: Revelation Dance
revelationdance.desc: The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. The user’s PRIMARY type determines the type of this move. (Dance)

coreenforcer.name: Core Enforcer
coreenforcer.desc: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.

tropkick.name: Trop Kick
tropkick.desc: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target’s Attack stat.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.zMoveEffect: makes the user the center of attention
instruct.desc: The user instructs the target to use the target’s last move again.

beakblast.name: Beak Blast
beakblast.desc: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the Pokémon while it’s heating up results in a burn. (Bullet, Pulse)

clangingscales.name: Clanging Scales
clangingscales.desc: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack the opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack. (Sound, Dance)

dragonhammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragonhammer.desc: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

brutalsmash.name: Brutal Smash
brutalsmash.desc: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage. The effort lowers the user's Attack stat harshly.

auroraveil.name: Aurora Veil
auroraveil.desc: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves by 33% for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

sinisterarrowraid.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
sinisterarrowraid.desc: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots both targets with poison tipped arrows. This badly poisons the targets.

maliciousmoonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault
maliciousmoonsault.desc: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the enemy team with full force. This burns both targets.

oceanicoperetta.name: Oceanic Operetta
oceanicoperetta.desc: The user, Primarina, summons a massive amount of water using its Z-Power and attacks the targets with full force, this causes the targets to grow drowsy. (Sound)

guardianofalola.name: Guardian of Alola
guardianofalola.desc: The user, the Land Spirit Pokémon, obtains Alola’s energy using its Z-Power and attacks the target. This reduces the target’s HP by 75% and heals the user for 25% dealt.

soulstealing7starstrike.name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
soulstealing7starstrike.desc: Marshadow punches and kicks the target consecutively, siphoning their energy. This heals Marshadow for 25% of damage dealt. (Punch)

stokedsparksurfer.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
stokedsparksurfer.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Raichu, attacks the target with full force. Raises Accuracy +1 and Speed +2 of user.

pulverizingpancake.name: Pulverizing Pancake
pulverizingpancake.desc: The user, Snorlax, uses Z-Power to move its enormous body to flatten the target, the remaining energy raises its Atk and Def, while lowering Speed.

extremeevoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extremeevoboost.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts every one of its main stats by 4 stages!

genesissupernova.name: Genesis Supernova
genesissupernova.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mew, attacks the target with full force. The terrain will be charged with psychic energy.

shelltrap.name: Shell Trap
shelltrap.desc: The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a physical move, the trap will explode and inflict damage on the opposing Pokémon.

fleurcannon.name: Fleur Cannon
fleurcannon.desc: The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.

psychicfangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychicfangs.desc: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect. (Jaw)

stompingtantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stompingtantrum.desc: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user’s previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

shadowbone.name: Shadow Bone
shadowbone.desc: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. (20%)

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.desc: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first. (+1 Priority)

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.desc: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. (20%)

prismaticlaser.name: Prismatic Laser
prismaticlaser.desc: The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn and heals for a portion of damage dealt.

spectralthief.name: Spectral Thief
spectralthief.desc: The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

sunsteelstrike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteelstrike.desc: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

moongeistbeam.name: Moongeist Beam
moongeistbeam.desc: The user emits a sinister ray to attack the target. This move can be used on the target regardless of its Abilities.

tearfullook.name: Tearful Look
tearfullook.desc: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats. (+1 Priority)

zingzap.name: Zing Zap
zingzap.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch. (30%)

naturesmadness.name: Nature’s Madness
naturesmadness.desc: The user hits the target with the force of nature. It halves the target’s HP.

multiattack.name: Multi-Attack
multiattack.desc: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move’s type.

10000000voltthunderbolt.name: 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt
10000000voltthunderbolt.desc: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits always land. Raises Sp.Atk and Spe.2 stages after use.

mindblown.name: Mind Blown
mindblown.desc: The user attacks everything around it by causing its own head to explode. This also damages the user.

plasmafists.name: Plasma Fists
plasmafists.desc: The user attacks with electrically charged fists. This move changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves. (Punch)

photongeyser.name: Photon Geyser
photongeyser.desc: The user attacks a target with a pillar of light. This move inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—whichever stat is higher for the user.

lightthatburnsthesky.name: Light That Burns the Sky
lightthatburnsthesky.desc: This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage— whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. This move ignores both target’s Abilities and always Crits.

searingsunrazesmash.name: Searing Sunraze Smash
searingsunrazesmash.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Solgaleo, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability. Raises Def.

menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.name: Menacing Moonraze Maelstrom
menacingmoonrazemaelstrom.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lunala, attacks the target with full force. This move can ignore the effect of the target’s Ability. Raises Sp. Def.

letssnuggleforever.name: Let’s Snuggle Forever
letssnuggleforever.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Mimikyu, squeezes the target with full force and prevents escape. This move traps targets in a clingy hug for 4-5 turns.

splinteredstormshards.name: Splintered Stormshards
splinteredstormshards.desc: With Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc, attacks the target with boulders. This move negates the terrain on the field and raises the Defense and Accuracy of the user.

clangoroussoulblaze.name: Clangorous Soulblaze
clangoroussoulblaze.desc: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o, attacks all Pokémon with full force. This move boosts all of the user’s stats. (Sound, Dance)
